menu-edit-copy-annotation.label.string: {count, plural, one {Copy Annotation} other {Copy { count } Annotations}}

item-menu-viewAttachment.label.string: Open {numAttachments, plural, one {{attachmentType, select, pdf {PDF} epub {EPUB} snapshot {Snapshot} other {Attachment}}} other {{attachmentType, select, pdf {PDFs} epub {EPUBs} snapshot {Snapshots} other {Attachments}}}} {openIn, select, tab {in New Tab} window {in New Window} other {}}

create-parent-intro.string: Enter a DOI, ISBN, PMID, arXiv ID, or ADS Bibcode to identify this file:

update-updates-found-intro-minor.string: An update for { app-name } is available:

update-updates-found-desc.string: It is recommended that you apply this update as soon as possible.

import-where-from.string: Where do you want to import from?

import-source-file.label.string: A file (BibTeX, RIS, Zotero RDF, etc.)

import-source-folder.label.string: A folder of PDFs or other files

import-create-collection.label.string: Place imported collections and items into new collection

import-file-handling-store.label.string: Copy files to the { app-name } storage folder

import-file-handling-link.label.string: Link to files in original location

import-fileHandling-description.string: Linked files cannot be synced by { app-name }.

import-online-new.label.string: Download new items only; don’t update previously imported items

file-interface-import-error.string: An error occurred while trying to import the selected file. Please ensure that the file is valid and try again.

file-interface-items-were-imported.string: {numItems, plural, =0 {No items were imported} one {One item was imported} other {{ numItems } items were imported}}

file-interface-items-were-relinked.string: {numRelinked, plural, =0 {No items were relinked} one {One item was relinked} other {{ numRelinked } items were relinked}}

import-mendeley-encrypted.string: The selected Mendeley database cannot be read, likely because it is encrypted. See How do I import a Mendeley library into Zotero? for more information.

file-interface-import-error-translator.string: An error occurred importing the selected file with “{ translator }”. Please ensure that the file is valid and try again.

import-online-intro.string: In the next step you will be asked to log in to { targetAppOnline } and grant { app-name } access. This is necessary to import your { targetApp } library into { app-name }.

import-online-intro2.string: { app-name } will never see or store your { targetApp } password.

import-online-form-intro.string: Please enter your credentials to log in to { targetAppOnline }. This is necessary to import your { targetApp } library into { app-name }.

import-online-wrong-credentials.string: Login to { targetApp } failed. Please re-enter credentials and try again.

import-online-blocked-by-plugin.string: The import cannot continue with { plugin } installed. Please disable this plugin and try again.

import-online-connection-error.string: { app-name } could not connect to { targetApp }. Please check your internet connection and try again.

items-table-cell-notes.aria-label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Note} other {{ count } Notes}}

rtfScan-introPage-description.string: { app-name } can automatically extract and reformat citations and insert a bibliography into RTF files. It currently supports citations in variations of the following formats:

rtfScan-introPage-description2.string: To get started, select an RTF input file and an output file below:

rtfScan-scanPage-description.string: { app-name } is scanning your document for citations. Please be patient.

rtfScan-citations-page-description.string: Please review the list of recognized citations below to ensure that { app-name } has selected the corresponding items correctly. Any unmapped or ambiguous citations must be resolved before proceeding to the next step.

rtfScan-format-page-description.string: { app-name } is processing and formatting your RTF file. Please be patient.

rtfScan-complete-page-description.string: Your document has now been scanned and processed. Please ensure that it is formatted correctly.

publications-intro.string: Items you add to My Publications will be shown on your profile page on zotero.org. If you choose to include attached files, they will be made publicly available under the license you specify. Only add work you yourself have created, and only include files if you have the rights to distribute them and wish to do so.

publications-include-adjust-at-any-time.string: You can adjust what to show at any time from the My Publications collection.

publications-intro-authorship-files.labe.string: I created this work and have the rights to distribute included files.

publications-sharing-page.string: Choose how your work may be shared

publications-sharing-keep-rights-field-w.string: Keep the existing Rights field where available

publications-sharing-text.string: You can reserve all rights to your work, license it under a Creative Commons license, or dedicate it to the public domain. In all cases, the work will be made publicly available via zotero.org.

publications-sharing-prompt.string: Would you like to allow your work to be shared by others?

publications-sharing-reserved.label.string: No, only publish my work on zotero.org

publications-sharing-cc.label.string: Yes, under a Creative Commons license

publications-sharing-cc0.label.string: Yes, and place my work in the public domain

publications-choose-license-text.string: A Creative Commons license allows others to copy and redistribute your work as long as they give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. Additional conditions can be specified below.

publications-choose-license-adaptations-.string: Allow adaptations of your work to be shared?

publications-choose-license-sharealike.l.string: Yes, as long as others share alike

publications-choose-license-commercial-p.string: Allow commercial uses of your work?

licenses-cc-more-info.string: Be sure you have read the Creative Commons Considerations for licensors before placing your work under a CC license. Note that the license you apply cannot be revoked, even if you later choose different terms or cease publishing the work.

licenses-cc0-more-info.string: Be sure you have read the Creative Commons CC0 FAQ before applying CC0 to your work. Please note that dedicating your work to the public domain is irreversible, even if you later choose different terms or cease publishing the work.

restart-in-troubleshooting-mode-dialog-d.string: { app-name } will restart with all plugins disabled. Some features may not function correctly while Troubleshooting Mode is enabled.

section-attachments.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Attachment} other {{ count } Attachments}}

section-attachments-annotations.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Annotation} other {{ count } Annotations}}

section-attachments-move-to-trash-messag.string: Are you sure you want to move “{ title }” to the trash?

section-notes.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Note} other {{ count } Notes}}

section-tags.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Tag} other {{ count } Tags}}

annotations-count.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Annotation} other {{ count } Annotations}}

attachment-info-convert-note.label.string: Migrate to {type, select, standalone {Standalone} child {Item} unknown {New}} Note

attachment-info-convert-note.tooltiptext.string: Adding notes to attachments is no longer supported, but you can edit this note by migrating it to a separate note.

attachment-rename-from-parent.tooltiptex.string: Rename File to Match Parent Item

file-renaming-auto-rename-prompt-body.string: Would you like to rename existing files in your library to match the new settings?

rename-files-preview-intro.string: { app-name } will rename the following files in your library to match their parent items:

rename-files-preview-no-files.string: All filenames already match parent items. No changes are required.

toggle-preview.label.string: {type, select, open {Hide} collapsed {Show} unknown {Toggle}} Attachment Preview

item-pane-message-items-selected.string: {count, plural, =0 {No items selected} one {{ count } item selected} other {{ count } items selected}}

item-pane-message-collections-selected.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } collection selected} other {{ count } collections selected}}

item-pane-message-searches-selected.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } search selected} other {{ count } searches selected}}

item-pane-message-objects-selected.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } object selected} other {{ count } objects selected}}

item-pane-message-unselected.string: {count, plural, =0 {No items in this view} one {{ count } item in this view} other {{ count } items in this view}}

item-pane-message-objects-unselected.string: {count, plural, =0 {No objects in this view} one {{ count } object in this view} other {{ count } objects in this view}}

item-pane-duplicates-merge-items.label.string: {count, plural, one {Merge { count } item} other {Merge { count } items}}

locate-library-lookup-no-resolver.string: You must choose a resolver from the { pane } pane of the { app-name } settings.

architecture-win32-warning-message.string: Switch to 64-bit { app-name } for the best performance. Your data won’t be affected.

architecture-x64-on-arm64-message.string: { app-name } is running in emulated mode. A native version of { app-name } will run more efficiently.

first-run-guidance-authorMenu.string: { app-name } lets you specify editors and translators too. You can turn an author into an editor or translator by selecting from this menu.

find-pdf-files-added.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } file added} other {{ count } files added}}

select-items-convertToStandaloneAttachme.string: {count, plural, one {Convert to Standalone Attachment} other {Convert to Standalone Attachments}}

select-items-convertToStandaloneNote.lab.string: {count, plural, one {Convert to Standalone Note} other {Convert to Standalone Notes}}

post-upgrade-message.string: Learn about the new features in { app-name } { version }

mac-word-plugin-install-message.string: Zotero needs access to Word data to install the Word plugin.

file-renaming-banner-message.string: { app-name } now automatically keeps attachment filenames in sync as you make changes to items.

connector-version-warning.string: The { app-name } Connector must be updated to work with this version of { app-name }.

userjs-pref-warning.string: Some { app-name } settings have been overridden using an unsupported method. { app-name } will revert them and restart.

preferences-auto-recognize-files.label.string: Automatically retrieve metadata for PDFs and ebooks

preferences-file-renaming-intro.string: { app-name } can automatically rename files based on the details of the parent item (title, author, etc.) and keep the filenames in sync as you make changes. Downloaded files are always initially named based on the parent item.

preferences-file-renaming-format-instruc.string: You can customize the filename pattern { app-name } uses to rename attachment files from parent metadata.
For example, “{ example }” in this template will be replaced with the title of the parent item, truncated at 50 characters.

preferences-reader-open-in-new-window.la.string: Open files in new windows instead of tabs

preferences-reader-auto-disable-tool.lab.string: Turn off note, text, and image annotation tools after each use

preferences-locate-library-lookup-intro.string: Library Lookup can find a resource online using your library’s OpenURL resolver.

preferences-styleManager-intro.string: { app-name } can generate citations and bibliographies in over 10,000 citation styles. Add styles here to make them available when selecting styles throughout { app-name }.

preferences-styleManager-add-from-file.t.string: Add a style from a file

preferences-styleManager-remove.string: Press { delete-or-backspace } to remove this style.

preferences-advanced-enable-local-api.la.string: Allow other applications on this computer to communicate with { app-name }

preferences-advanced-server-disabled.string: The { app-name } HTTP server is disabled.

preferences-sync-reset-restore-to-server.string: { app-name } will replace “{ libraryName }” on { domain } with data from this computer.
{ remoteItemsDeletedCount } {remoteItemsDeletedCount, plural, one {item} other {items}} in the online library will be permanently deleted.

{ general-sentence-separator }{localItemsCount, plural, =0 {The library on this computer and the online library will be empty.} one {1 item will remain on this computer and in the online library.} other {{ localItemsCount } items will remain on this computer and in the online library.}}
{remoteItemsDeletedCount, plural, one {Delete 1 item} other {Delete { remoteItemsDeletedCount } items}}

reader-no-annotations.string: Create an annotation to see it in the sidebar

reader-prompt-transfer-from-pdf-text.string: Annotations stored in the PDF file will be moved to { target }.

reader-prompt-password-protected.string: The operation is not supported for password-protected PDF files.

reader-prompt-delete-pages-text.string: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete { count } page from the PDF file?} other {Are you sure you want to delete { count } pages from the PDF file?}}

reader-prompt-delete-annotations-text.string: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete the selected annotation?} other {Are you sure you want to delete the selected annotations?}}

reader-enter-password.string: Enter the password to open this PDF file

reader-find-previous.string: Find the previous occurrence of the phrase

reader-find-next.string: Find the next occurrence of the phrase

reader-a11y-move-annotation.string: Use the arrow keys to move the annotation.

reader-a11y-edit-text-annotation.string: To move the end of the text annotation, hold { general-key-shift } and use the left/right arrow keys. To move the start of the annotation, hold { general-key-shift }-{ reader-move-annotation-start-key } and use the arrow keys.

reader-a11y-resize-annotation.string: To resize the annotation, hold { general-key-shift } and use the arrow keys.

reader-a11y-annotation-popup-appeared.string: Use Tab to navigate the annotation popup.

-reader-a11y-textual-annotation-instruct.string: To annotate text via the keyboard, first use “{ reader-find-in-document }” to locate the phrase, and then press { general-key-control }-{ option-or-alt }-{ number } to turn the search result into an annotation.

-reader-a11y-annotation-instruction.string: To add this annotation into the document, focus the document and press { general-key-control }-{ option-or-alt }-{ number }.

reader-toolbar-draw.aria-description.string: This annotation type cannot be created via the keyboard.

reader-find-in-document-input.aria-descr.string: To turn a search result into a highlight annotation, press { general-key-control }-{ option-or-alt }-1. To turn a search result into an underline annotation, press { general-key-control }-{ option-or-alt }-2.

reader-import-from-epub-prompt-text.string:
{ app-name } found {count, plural, one {{ count } { tool } annotation} other {{ count } { tool } annotations}}, last edited { lastModifiedRelative }.

Any { app-name } annotations that were previously imported from this ebook will be updated.

reader-import-from-epub-no-annotations-c.string:
This ebook does not appear to contain any importable annotations.

{ app-name } can import ebook annotations created in Calibre and KOReader.

reader-import-from-epub-no-annotations-o.string:
“{ filename }” does not appear to contain any Calibre or KOReader annotations.

If this ebook has been annotated with KOReader, try selecting a “metadata.epub.lua” file directly.

-integration-editBibliography-include-un.string: To include an uncited item in your bibliography, select it from the items list and press { general-add }.

-integration-editBibliography-exclude-ci.string: You can also exclude a cited item by selecting it from the list of references and pressing { general-remove }.

-integration-editBibliography-edit-refer.string: To change how a reference is formatted, use the text editor.

integration-citationDialog-lib-no-items.string: {search, select, true {No selected, open, or cited items match the current search} other {No selected or open items}}

integration-citationDialog-btn-mode.titl.string: {mode, select, library {Switch to List Mode} list {Switch to Library Mode} other {Switch Mode}}

integration-citationDialog-btn-mode.aria.string: {mode, select, library {The dialog is in Library mode. Click to switch to List Mode.} list {The dialog is in List mode. Click to switch to Library Mode.} other {Switch Mode}}

integration-citationDialog-general-instr.string: Use Left/Right-Arrow to navigate the items of this citation. Press Tab to select items to add to this citation.

integration-citationDialog-enter-to-add-.string: Press { return-or-enter } to add this item to the citation.

integration-citationDialog-search-for-it.string: Search for items to add to the citation

integration-citationDialog-aria-bubble.a.string: This item is included in the citation. Press space bar to customize the item. { integration-citationDialog-general-instructions }

integration-citationDialog-single-input..string: Press Tab to select items to add to this citation. Press Escape to discard the changes and close the dialog.

integration-citationDialog-aria-item-lis.string: Use Up/Down Arrow to change item selection. { integration-citationDialog-enter-to-add-item }

integration-citationDialog-aria-item-lib.string: Use Right/Left Arrow to change item selection. { integration-citationDialog-enter-to-add-item }

integration-citationDialog-collections-t.string: Select a collection and press Tab to navigate its items.

integration-citationDialog-items-table-a.string: This item has been added to the citation. Press { return-or-enter } to add it again or { delete-or-backspace } to remove it.

integration-prefs-bookmarks-description.string: Bookmarks can be shared between Word and LibreOffice, but may cause errors if accidentally modified and cannot be inserted into footnotes.

integration-prefs-bookmarks-formatNotice.string: {show, select, true {The document must be saved as .doc or .docx.} other {}}

integration-prefs-automaticCitationUpdat.string: Citations with pending updates will be highlighted in the document
Disabling updates can speed up citation insertion in large documents. Click Refresh to update citations manually.

integration-prefs-automaticJournalAbbevi.string: The “Journal Abbr” field will be ignored.

integration-prefs-exportDocument.label.string: Switch to a Different Word Processor…

integration-error-unable-to-find-winword.string: { app-name } could not find a running Word instance.

integration-warning-citation-changes-wil.string: You have made changes to a citation that will be lost if you continue.

integration-warning-bibliography-changes.string: You have made changes to the bibliography that will be lost if you continue.

integration-warning-documentPreferences-.string: You have made changes to the document preferences that will be lost if you continue.

integration-warning-command-is-running.string: A word processor integration command is already running.

note-editor-update-notice.string:
This note was edited with a newer version of { app-name }.
Please update { app-name } to make changes.

note-editor-link-popup-appeared.string: Link popup appeared. Use Shift-Tab to navigate it.

note-editor-citation-popup-appeared.string: Citation popup appeared. Use Shift-Tab to navigate it.
